notes: Test PASSED. Primary CTA button was visible and clickable. Clicking the button triggered a POST request to /buy-now endpoint (returned 200), and user was redirected directly to simpleswap.io with a valid exchange ID. NO popup appeared during the process. The flow works exactly as expected - $59 purchase goes directly to SimpleSwap without any intermediate popup.
